title: Wolfkeeper's Woman
description: A country where the strong survive. Some people are strong of body. Other people are strong in spirit. The warrior Wolfkeeper is such a man. A man not only physically strong but strong willed with a wisdom beyond his years. A wisdom that serves his people well. Until the day he begins question how he could have tender feelings for someone he considers an enemy.There were no pangs of conscience when he took the child for his brother and sister-in-law to raise. They had no children of there own. The Mother even though an enemy the infant wouldn’t survive the journey if he hadn’t brought her along.Cassie raised in a orphanage only recently began to believe she found happiness. Now she learned to hate. She just wants her son back.Thrown into an unfamiliar lifestyle and unable to communicate she must learn how to stay alive for her son.She will learn the language. She will follow the rules. She will do anything she needs to get her son back. But will it be enough?
author: Lisa  Day
